text: Christine Jane Baranski (born May 2, 1952) is an American actress, singer, and producer. On stage, she played Mrs. Lovett in Sweeney Todd and the title character in Mame. She has also acted in multiple movies. Baranski was born in Buffalo, New York. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Buffalo, New York
title: Christine Baranski
